attributes.action: Force a by-election in Andrew Bridgens ‎North West Leicestershire Constituency
attributes.additional_details: He was elected as a Conservative now hold views of the Reclaim Party. Constituents should choose to stay with him or choose an alternative.
attributes.background:
Force a by-election in Andrew Bridgens ‎North West Leicestershire Constituency.
After saying if MPs defect they should hold a By-election

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for by-elections for particular constituencies.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to require a by-election in any constituency where an MP resigns from their party.
